snippet: Swansea City manager Garry Monk risks punishment from the FA after accusing referee Michael Oliver and Stoke City winger Victor Moses of cheating in his team's 2-1 Premier League defeat at the Britannia Stadium on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Monk Risks FA Sanctions After Accusing Referee of Cheating
headline.main: Monk Risks FA Sanctions After Accusing Referee of Cheating

lead_paragraph: Swansea City manager Garry Monk risks punishment from the FA after accusing referee Michael Oliver and Stoke City winger Victor Moses of cheating in his team's 2-1 Premier League defeat at the Britannia Stadium on Sunday.
